original_text: Sentence reduction is one of approaches for text summarization that has been attracted many researchers and scholars of natural language processing field. In this paper, we present a method that generates sentence reduction and applying in Vietnamese text summarization using Bayesian Network model. Bayesian network model is used to find the best likelihood short sentence through compare difference of probability. Experimental results with 980 sentences, show that our method really effectively in generating sentence reduction that understandable, readable and exactly grammar.
original_translation: La reducción de oraciones es uno de los enfoques para la sumarización de textos que ha atraído a muchos investigadores y académicos del campo del procesamiento del lenguaje natural. En este documento, presentamos un método que genera la reducción de oraciones y se aplica en la sumarización de texto en vietnamita utilizando el modelo de Redes Bayesianas. El modelo de red bayesiana se utiliza para encontrar la mejor probabilidad de una frase corta mediante la comparación de diferencias de probabilidad. Los resultados experimentales con 980 oraciones muestran que nuestro método es realmente efectivo en la generación de reducciones de oraciones comprensibles, legibles y con una gramática exacta.

In this paper, we present a method that generates sentence reduction and applying in Vietnamese text summarization using Bayesian Network model.
Bayesian network model is used to find the best likelihood short sentence through compare difference of probability.
Experimental results with 980 sentences, show that our method really effectively in generating sentence reduction that understandable, readable and exactly grammar.
